class DQN[source]

DQN(state_sz:int, action_sz:int, hidden=512) :: Module

Same as nn.Module, but no need for subclasses to call super().__init__

Parameters:

  • state_sz : <class 'int'>

  • action_sz : <class 'int'>

  • hidden : <class 'int'>, optional

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
dqn=DQN(4,2)
dqn(torch.randn((10,4)))

        [ 0.3835,  0.6218],
        [ 0.4401,  0.0927],
        [ 0.3388,  0.0771],
        [ 0.3306,  0.2651],
        [ 0.3461,  0.1709],
        [ 0.2690, -0.1924],
        [ 0.4253,  0.0053],
        [ 0.3839,  0.0492],
        [ 0.4150,  0.2885]], grad_fn=<AddmmBackward>)

class ArgMaxFeed[source]

ArgMaxFeed() :: AgentCallback

Basic class handling tweaks of a callback loop by changing a obj in various events

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class DiscreteEpsilonRandomSelect[source]

DiscreteEpsilonRandomSelect(idx=0, min_epsilon=0.2, max_epsilon=1, max_steps=5000) :: AgentCallback

Basic class handling tweaks of a callback loop by changing a obj in various events

Parameters:

  • idx : <class 'int'>, optional

  • min_epsilon : <class 'float'>, optional

  • max_epsilon : <class 'int'>, optional

  • max_steps : <class 'int'>, optional

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
agent=Agent(dqn,cbs=[ArgMaxFeed,DiscreteEpsilonRandomSelect(max_epsilon=1)]).to(default_device())
agent.model.train();
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
test_eq(agent.cbs[1].epsilon,1)
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
for i in range(agent.cbs[1].max_steps//2):
    action,exp=agent.do_action(state=torch.randn((10,4)).to(default_device()))

        [1],
        [0],
        [0],
        [0],
        [0],
        [0],
        [0],
        [0],
        [0]])

{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
agent.show_loop()

Start Action
   - before_preprocess: []
   - after_preprocess: []
   - before_action  : [ArgMaxFeed]
   - after_action   : []
   - before_noise   : [DiscreteEpsilonRandomSelect]
   - after_noise    : []
End Action

Blueprint for defining a metric

class DQNTrainer[source]

DQNTrainer(discount=0.99, n_steps=1) :: Callback

Performs traditional training on next_q. Requires a callback such as RegularNextQ

Parameters:

  • discount : <class 'float'>, optional

  • n_steps : <class 'int'>, optional

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
dqn=DQN(4,2)
agent=Agent(dqn,cbs=[ArgMaxFeed,DiscreteEpsilonRandomSelect])
source=Source(cbs=[GymLoop('CartPole-v1',agent,steps_count=1,seed=None,
                           steps_delta=1,#mode='rgb_array'
                          ),
                   FirstLast,
                   #ResReduce(reduce_by=4)
                  ])

dls=SourceDataBlock().dataloaders([source],n=500,bs=1,num_workers=0)

exp_replay=ExperienceReplayCallback(bs=128,max_sz=1000,warmup_sz=128)
# er_tb=ExperienceReplayTensorboard(every_epoch=3)

learn=Learner(dls,agent,loss_func=MSELoss(),
              cbs=[exp_replay,DQNTrainer(n_steps=1)#,er_tb
                  ],
              metrics=[Reward,Epsilon,NEpisodes
                      ])

Could not do one pass in your dataloader, there is something wrong in it
